parameters.valve_hemodynamics: Central jet ≤50% RA, Vena contracta width ≤0.7 cm, ERO ≤0.4 cm², R Vol ≤45 mL
Central jet >50% RA, Vena contracta width >0.7 cm, ERO >0.4 cm², R Vol >45 mL, Dense CW signal with dagger shape, Hepatic vein systolic flow reversal
parameters.hemodynamic_consequences: Dilated RV and RA, Elevated RA with cV wave

parameters.valve_hemodynamics: Central jet >50% RA, Vena contracta width >0.7 cm, ERO >0.4 cm², R Vol >45 mL, Dense CW signal with dagger shape, Hepatic vein systolic flow reversal
parameters.hemodynamic_consequences: Dilated RV and RA, Elevated RA with cV wave
parameters.clinical_symptoms: Elevated venous pressure, Dyspnea on exertion, fatigue, ascites, edema
